headline: ISIS claims responsibility for deadly blasts in Damascus suburb
content: By Yousuf Basil and Joshua Berlinger, CNNUpdated 1925 GMT (0325 HKT) January 31, 2016  (CNN)ISIS claimed responsibility for a triple bombing Sunday that killed at least 45 people and injured more than 100 others in a Damascus suburb, according to a statement circulating online from supporters of the terrorist group. CNN's  Yousuf Basil and Schams Elwazer contributed to this report.
